title: Exciting Road & Gravel Tech on the Horizon from Shimano, DT Swiss, & Manitou?
content:
Patents reveal an aerodynamic gravel suspension fork from Manitou, a five-spoke composite wheel from DT Swiss, and non-contact charging of a rear derailleur from Shimano!

Read the full article at Exciting Road & Gravel Tech on the Horizon from Shimano, DT Swiss, & Manitou? on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
